title: Looking for VISTA HL7 messaging experts
description: The VA needs two informatics experts. The first expert is needed to help configure VISTA to send HL7 messages containing radiology reports from VISTA to a Mirth server. The second expert needs experience with Mirth Connect to help us configure the Mirth server to accept messages from Vista and generate email messages based on the content of the radiology reports.
responsibilities: The goal is to make sure that all report that need to be coded abnormal are coded correctly and the referring provider receive an alert regarding the abnormal results.
